explanation: You're the person who has a 5-year plan for your 5-year plan. You can see 10 moves ahead, but somehow still forget where you put your keys.

detail.dream_about: A world where everyone just follows the plan.
detail.hates: People who 'wing it' and somehow still succeed.
detail.most_likely_to: Have a backup plan for their backup plan.
detail.motto: Failing to plan is planning to fail.

alternate_career_path.title: Escape Room Designer
alternate_career_path.desc: If anyone can create puzzles that require overthinking and strategic maneuvering, it's you. Just make sure your players can actually escape!

works_well_with.explanation: Your meticulous planning pairs perfectly with the Organizer's love for execution. Together, you can strategize and execute flawlessly.

explanation: You're constantly coming up with ideas, most of which are way ahead of their time (and maybe a little impractical). Your brainstorming sessions are legendary, but so are your half-finished projects.

detail.dream_about: A world where imagination is the only limit.
detail.hates: People who ask 'but how does it work?'
detail.most_likely_to: Start a project at 2 AM because inspiration struck.
detail.motto: Why do it the usual way when you can do it your way?

alternate_career_path.title: Fantasy World Architect
alternate_career_path.desc: You're already creating worlds in your mind, might as well get paid for it. (Dragons not included).

works_well_with.explanation: Your ideas are out of this world, and the Techie can figure out how to bring them into this one.

explanation: You're the go-to person for anything with a plug or a code. You love solving problems—especially the ones you created while trying to 'improve' things.

detail.dream_about: A day when all code compiles on the first try.
detail.hates: Non-techies who say, 'Can't you just make it work?'
detail.most_likely_to: Spend more time automating a task than the task itself takes.
detail.motto: There's a bug in the system... oh wait, that's my code.

alternate_career_path.title: Robot Therapist
alternate_career_path.desc: Because even robots need someone to talk to after dealing with human errors all day.

works_well_with.explanation: While the Creator dreams it up, you're the one who makes sure the lights stay on and the wheels keep turning.

explanation: You lead by example, often into the fray. Your confidence is your superpower, but your team knows to duck when you start making 'gut decisions.'

detail.dream_about: Rallying the troops for one last big push.
detail.hates: People who say 'let’s wait and see.'
detail.most_likely_to: Give a rousing speech that may or may not be relevant.
detail.motto: Lead, follow, or get out of the way.

alternate_career_path.title: Galactic Emperor
alternate_career_path.desc: Why stop at leading a team when you could rule an entire galaxy? Just remember: with great power comes great paperwork.

works_well_with.explanation: Your leadership and the Networker's ability to connect with everyone makes for a dynamic, unstoppable team.

explanation: You know everyone, and everyone knows you. You're the social glue of any group, but sometimes you forget what you were actually supposed to be doing.

detail.dream_about: Attending the most exclusive parties, with an invite in hand.
detail.hates: People who don't know how to 'work the room.'
detail.most_likely_to: Turn a 5-minute conversation into a 50-minute one.
detail.motto: It’s not what you know, it’s who you know.

alternate_career_path.title: Professional Party Crasher
alternate_career_path.desc: Why wait for an invite when you can make every party better just by showing up?

works_well_with.explanation: The Leader leads, and you connect the dots. Together, you make things happen.

explanation: You have a place for everything, and everything is in its place. Your spreadsheets have spreadsheets, but your friends know to call you when they need a rescue mission.

detail.dream_about: A world where chaos is just a myth.
detail.hates: People who don’t respect the color-coding system.
detail.most_likely_to: Have a labeled drawer for everything, including labeled drawers.
detail.motto: If it’s not organized, it’s not happening.

alternate_career_path.title: Sock Drawer Consultant
alternate_career_path.desc: Because even the most chaotic sock drawers can benefit from your organizational prowess.

works_well_with.explanation: The Strategist plans, and you execute. Together, you're a force of nature.

explanation: You see life as one big adventure, and every day is a new opportunity to explore. Of course, your friends know to keep an eye on you, because sometimes your adventures need a bit of rescuing.

detail.dream_about: Climbing the next mountain (literally or metaphorically).
detail.hates: Being told to 'stay in one place.'
detail.most_likely_to: Book a one-way ticket to somewhere they've never heard of.
detail.motto: Adventure is out there—so go find it!

alternate_career_path.title: Extreme Couponer
alternate_career_path.desc: Because getting 90% off with a stack of coupons is just as thrilling as scaling Everest, right?

works_well_with.explanation: The Caregiver keeps you safe while you explore the unknown. It’s a partnership that balances risk with care.

explanation: You have a heart as big as your to-do list. You're always there to help, even when people don’t ask for it. But hey, who’s going to argue with free cookies?

detail.dream_about: A world where everyone is happy and healthy.
detail.hates: People who refuse to accept help (especially when they need it).
detail.most_likely_to: Show up with a casserole at the first sign of trouble.
detail.motto: A little kindness goes a long way.

alternate_career_path.title: Professional Cuddler
alternate_career_path.desc: Why not get paid for those hugs you’re always giving? You’ve got the warmth, now bring the snuggles.

works_well_with.explanation: You keep the Adventurer safe and sound while they tackle the world’s challenges. Together, you balance excitement with care.
